field.label: Tag [set]
field.help: Optional tag to set for requests matching this range which can be used to selectively match dhcp options

field.label: Static
field.help: Enable DHCP for the network specified, but do not to dynamically allocate IP addresses: only hosts which have static addresses will receive one

field.label: Lease time
field.help: Defines how long the addresses (leases) given out by the server are valid (in seconds)

field.label: Domain
field.help: Offer the specified domain to machines in this range.

field.label: Description
field.help: You may enter a description here for your reference (not parsed).
